  children={"Hide or unhide docs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/rest/api/v1/governance/documents/visibilityoverrides"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets the visibility-override state of the documents specified, effectively hiding or un-hiding documents.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json; charset=UTF-8":{"schema":{"properties":{"visibilityOverrides":{"type":"array","items":{"properties":{"docId":{"type":"string"},"override":{"type":"string","enum":["NONE","HIDE_FROM_ALL","HIDE_FROM_GROUPS","HIDE_FROM_ALL_EXCEPT_OWNER"],"description":"The visibility-override state of the document."}},"title":"DocumentVisibilityOverride"}}},"title":"UpdateDocumentVisibilityOverridesRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json; charset=UTF-8":{"schema":{"properties":{"results":{"type":"array","items":{"allOf":[{"properties":{"docId":{"type":"string"},"override":{"type":"string","enum":["NONE","HIDE_FROM_ALL","HIDE_FROM_GROUPS","HIDE_FROM_ALL_EXCEPT_OWNER"],"description":"The visibility-override state of the document."}},"title":"DocumentVisibilityOverride"},{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this document was successfully set to its desired visibility state."}}}],"title":"DocumentVisibilityUpdateResult"},"description":"The documents and whether their visibility was successfully updated."}},"title":"UpdateDocumentVisibilityOverridesResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Permissions error"},"500":{"description":"Internal error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
